title: "Fall4Hawaii" With Castle Resorts & Hotels
text:
Castle Resorts & Hotels
*New Package Offers Four Exclusive Incentives for Fall Travelers*
HONOLULU , Oct. 8, Castle Resorts & Hotels is inviting travelers to fall for Hawaii...whether it's an upcountry retreat on the Big Island, beach vacation on Maui or Kauai , city escape on Oahu or friendly excursion to Molokai . For a limited time, Castle will offer "Fall4Hawaii," featuring four exclusive incentives for new bookings, including 40 percent off room rates, free room upgrades, free parking and HawaiianMiles for every dollar spent.
"With today's booking window getting shorter, our Fall4Hawaii promotion offers an additional incentive – well, four in fact – to encourage travel during the fall season to Hawaii ," said president and COO Alan Mattson . "It's not too late to fall for Hawaii , and we hope to see travelers taking advantage of this great offer to experience a memorable Hawaiian vacation."
Among Castle's participating properties are Halii Kai at Waikoloa , Kona Bali Kai , Kona Reef Hotel, Hilo Hawaiian Hotel, Kanaloa at Kona, and Waimea Country Lodge on the Big Island; Kamaole Sands and Paki Maui on Maui ; Molokai Shores on Molokai ; Waikiki Shore and Waikiki Grand Hotel on Oahu ; and Kaha Lani , Kiahuna Plantation & The Beach Bungalows, Makahuena at Poipu, Poipu Shores, and Mokihana on Kauai .
The "Fall4Hawaii" promotion is valid through December 15, 2015 . Room upgrades apply to the same room category only and are subject to availability. Free parking upgrade does not apply at participating Oahu properties. Guests must also present their HawaiianMiles membership card in order to earn additional miles.
For more information on the "Fall4Hawaii" offer or to make a reservation at any of Castle's participating properties, visit www.castleresorts.com/fall-4-hawaii or call (808) 545-3510.
About Castle Resorts & Hotels
Castle Resorts & Hotels was founded in 1993 and is a wholly owned subsidiary of The Castle Group, Inc. Headquartered in Honolulu , Castle manages a broad portfolio of guest accommodations including value/economy hotels, full-service hotels and spacious all-suite condominium resorts and luxury villas in the Hawaiian Islands on Oahu , Maui , Molokai , Kauai and Hawaii , and in New Zealand on the North Shore of Auckland . To learn more or to make a reservation, visit www.castleresorts.com or call (808) 367-5004. Join us and keep up with current events at www.twitter.com/castleresorts and www.facebook.com/CastleResortsAndHotels .
